settings.sub-text: Our goal is to make your experience easy and above all - fun! We offer 3 simple ways to start your fireplace project with a free sales consult.

settings.title: Showroom Consultations
settings.text: Explore dozens of beautiful product displays in person. Showroom walk-ins are most common, and we don't require an appointment to visit our showroom, but you're welcome to make one. Showroom consults typically last 30 minutes.

settings.title: In-Home Consultations
settings.text: Skip the showroom. Work with a sales expert in person to discuss your project and options without leaving the comfort of your home.   In-home consults typically last 45 minutes.

settings.title: Virtual Consultations
settings.text: Experience our showrooms virtually by connecting with a sales expert through video on your tablet or smartphone to discuss your upcoming project and see product displays. Virtual consults typically last 30 minutes.

settings.title: Fill Out a Project Checklist
settings.text: This will help our sales associates better understand your project and give it a head start.

settings.title: Take Pictures of Your Space
settings.text: Take 2-3 pictures of the room where the project will take place. We also encourage you to bring any inspirational photos.

settings.title: Visit a Fireside Showroom
settings.text: Bring your project checklist and photos to any of our showrooms. Our sales consultants will be happy to assist you!

settings.title: Ready to Get Started?
settings.sub_text: During the initial consultation, our goal is to learn more about your fireplace needs and goals. From there, we'll empower you to make well-informed decisions that leave you feeling confident.

settings.heading: Let's Get to Work
settings.content:
Want to convert your wood fireplace to gas, add a new fireplace, or replace an existing fireplace? 

Schedule a free consultation today! No obligations. No gimmicks. Just everything you need to take the next step for your project.
